name: json
description: The JSON module provides methods for transforming data between native JavaScript objects and their JSON string equivalent.
author: lsmith

examples.name: json-connect
examples.description: Use JSON to parse data received via XMLHttpRequest via Y.io calls â€” a simple JSON use case.

examples.name: json-freeze-thaw
examples.displayName: Rebuilding Class Instances from JSON Data
examples.description: Use the replacer and reviver parameters to reconstitute object instances that have been serialized to JSON.

examples.name: json-convert-values
examples.displayName: Adding New Object Members During Parsing
examples.description: Use a currency conversion calculation to add a new price member to a JSON response, demonstrating how JSON data, once retrieved, can be transformed during parsing.
